entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:05 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 2.8Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gore Bay-Manitoulin Airport 9:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: NE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to snow or rain overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 9:06 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
